discussion_comments.comment_body:
_⚠️ Potential issue_

**Default value mismatch for `data` property**  
The `data` field is defined as an object but has `default: []`. This should be `default: {}` to match its type.

<details>
<summary>🤖 Prompt for AI Agents</summary>

```
In app/config/specs/swagger2-1.6.x-client.json around lines 4667 to 4673, the
`data` property is defined as an object but incorrectly has a default value of
an empty array ([]). Change the default value to an empty object ({}) to match
the declared type and ensure consistency in the schema.
```

</details>

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment by CodeRabbit -->

discussion_comments.comment_body:
_⚠️ Potential issue_

**Type mismatch in default value for `data`**  
The schema defines `data` as an `object` but sets its default to an empty array (`[]`), while the example is `{}`. This violates JSON Schema and will cause validation errors. Change the default to `{}` to match the type and example.

<details>
<summary>🤖 Prompt for AI Agents</summary>

```
In app/config/specs/swagger2-1.6.x-server.json around lines 7688 to 7694, the
default value for the `data` property is incorrectly set to an empty array `[]`
while the schema type is `object` and the example is `{}`. Update the default
value to an empty object `{}` to match the declared type and example, ensuring
JSON Schema validation passes.
```

</details>
